```{r dataload}
library(tidyverse)
library(patchwork)

filepath <- here::here("extdata/Figure_S1_lidAvoidance.csv")
  
lid_data <- read.csv(filepath) %>%
  format_AvoidData(day.correct = "treatment") %>%
  mutate(plate = factor(seq(1:nrow(.))),
         treatment = factor(treatment, levels = c("none", "lid"))) %>% 
  mutate(group = interaction(strain, treatment)) %>% droplevels()

plot1 = lid_data %>%
  plot_plasticityIndex(xvar = strain) + labs(title = "1-oct (corrected)") + 
  scale_color_plot(palette = "grey-blue", drop = TRUE) + guides(color = FALSE) + facet_grid(~treatment)

plot1

glmm <- lme4::glmer(data = lid_data, 
                    formula = cbind(nCue,nControl) ~ group + (1|plate),
                    family = binomial,
                    control= lme4::glmerControl(optimizer="bobyqa"))

stan_glmm <-  rstanarm::stan_glmer(data = lid_data, 
                  formula = cbind(nCue,nControl) ~ group + (1 | date) + (1|plate),
                  chains = 6, cores = 4, seed = 2000,iter=6000,
                  family = binomial,
    control = list(adapt_delta=0.99))


glm.lsm.list <- emmeans(glmm, "group")
glm.contrasts <- contrast(glm.lsm.list, "trt.vs.ctrl")

library(nlme)
lm <- lm(rel.Logit ~ groupt,data = lid_data)
anova(lm)
lm.lsm.list <- lsmeans::ref.grid(lm) %>% lsmeans::lsmeans(., pairwise ~ strain | treatment, adjust = "Tukey")
```
